Subject: Bloodblade's wandering path ((Bloodblade)) --> no one for now...
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

OOC: It would be good to adopt a uniform title style so that 
everyone could know what posts to check. Talk about it on NBW online.

Bic:

Bloodblade had been tyhrown out of the Tripredacus base and had fled 
as quick as he could, fearing that Darkangel would have killed him. 
Now, he was lost with only the single memory of his landing to rely 
on.

He was in a desert, near a scorched hillside where water once ran.

He crouched and lied down under a protruding rock. He couldn't 
understand why, but he felt something was amiss. Looking at the cold 
night sky, he saw a metal ball floating on the horizon. It was huge, 
bigger than even the moon. He could even see a cloud of... things, 
floating around it.

Bloodblade: I do not know why, but I feel that I am tied to this 
planet. One day, I will find out more...
